content: hello there you can make the fish with any yarn you wish this pattern is perfect for wool remains ideas for the fish cat toy fishing game or a crib-mobile material you need 1 crochet hook 2 5 mm 2 catania wool from schachenmayr in three different colors 3 fiberfill sewing needle 4 safety eyes size 8 mm the body of the fish is made with single_crochet the fins are crocheted to the body stitches you should now for the fins half_double_crochet double_crochet and triple crochet have fun
